title: Tech Talk 1: Introduction to Linux
description:
The goal of this course is to present the most common Unix
text manipulation commands

steps.title: Step 1: Set-up - less and more command
Step 2: wc, head, tail and sed commands
Step 3: Cut, tr and grep commands

environment.uimessage1: [32_Your Interactive Bash Terminal. A safe place to learn and execute commands.[m
